titles: Chloridia Rites to Chloris and her nymphs. Personated in a masque, at court. By the Queenes Maiesty and her ladies. At Shroue-tide. 1630.
author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.
notes: The year date on title-page is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
